Package org.graffiti.plugins.views.matrix

Class MatrixView

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • org.graffiti.plugin.view.AbstractView
            • org.graffiti.plugins.views.matrix.MatrixView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.dnd.Autoscroll, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener, AttributeConsumer, AttributeListener, EdgeListener, GraphListener, NodeListener, TransactionListener, View, Zoomable, ZoomListener

    public class MatrixView
extends AbstractView
implements java.awt.event.ActionListener, AttributeConsumer
    Provides a matrix view for the given graph.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.7 $
